message: Hello Bob! I'm excited to offer you this amazing product. I think it's a great opportunity for you to get your hands on something truly valuable. I'm willing to sell it to you for $90. What do you think?
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $85. Is that something you'd be willing to consider?
I understand you're looking for a better deal, Bob. I'm willing to meet you halfway. I can offer you the product for $92. It's a fair price considering the value it brings. What do you think?
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I was thinking more along the lines of $88. Can you consider that?
I'm not willing to go all the way to $88, but I can offer you a compromise. I'll meet you at $94. It's still a great deal considering the product's value. What do you think?
I'm not willing to go to $94, but I'm willing to meet you halfway again. Can you consider $89?
I'm not willing to go all the way to $89, but I can offer you a slight adjustment. I'll meet you at $91. It's still a good deal for both of us. What do you think?
I appreciate your flexibility, but I'm still looking for a better deal. Can you consider $86?
I'm getting close to my minimum price, Bob. I'm willing to meet you at $87. It's the best I can do. What do you think?
I'm willing to meet you at $85, but that's as low as I'm willing to go. If you can't meet me here, I'll have to consider other options.
